entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
